creator: ALPHATIER Studios
descriptionHtml:
Build your own mafia empire and rise to Idle Mafia Boss.

Face exciting challenges to earn as much money as possible.
Expand your ‘business’, manage your mafia organisation and become rich.
Build an empire, control your business interests and earn Idle Cash. Even when your’e offline!


Features:

• Expand your mafia organisation and automate your business activities.
• Continue to earn Idle cash – even when you are not playing.
• Invest in new, lucrative opportunities to boost your income.
• Hire managers and streamline operations to maximize your profits
• Gain control of increasingly profitable businesses
• Prestige feature
• No active internet connection required


Become the Boss of Bosses. Welcome to the world of Idle Mafia Boss!

Like Idle Mafia Boss on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/idlemafiaboss/
Follow Idle Mafia Boss on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/idlemafiaboss/

Experiencing issues? Do you have any suggestions regarding Idle Mafia Boss?
We look forward to hearing from you: support@idlemafiaboss.com

title: Idle Mafia Boss: Cosa Nostra

creator: ALPHATIER Studios
descriptionHtml:
Welcome to the Cosa Nostra! Play and relive the exciting history of the american mafia and rise up to become their biggest Boss ever!

Build up a powerfull organisation from the early 30s, the time of the prohibition through the decades with various business activities such as the production and trading of illegal alcohol, gambling, money laundering, bank robbery, secret bars and night clubs.

The famous Dons of the Mafia like Al Capone and Lucky Luciano will guide you, side by side you will conquer New York, Chicago and Hollywood, build an empire in dazzling Las Vegas and become the King of Miami...

Face exciting challenges to earn as much money as possible.
Expand your ‘business’, manage and grow your mafia organisation and become allmighty and rich. Build an empire, control and run your businesses and earn tons of Idle Cash. Even when your’e offline!

Become the Capo dei Capi, the Boss of the Bosses... the Idle Mafia Boss!


Features:

• Expand your mafia organisation and automate your business activities.
• Rule the US and cities like New York, Chicago, Hollywood, Las Vegas and Miami.
• Continue to earn Idle cash – even when you are not playing.
• Invest in new, lucrative crime businesses to boost your income.
• Become rich managing 25 illegal Business Locations in over 5 major cities.
• Hire managers and streamline operations to maximize your profits
• Gain control of increasingly profitable businesses
• Prestige feature
• No active internet connection required


Start now and become the capo dei Capi, the Boss of Bosses.
Welcome to the glittering and exciting world of Idle Mafia Boss!

Like Idle Mafia Boss on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/idlemafiaboss/
Follow Idle Mafia Boss on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/idlemafiaboss/

Experiencing issues? Do you have any suggestions regarding Idle Mafia Boss?
We look forward to hearing from you: support@idlemafiaboss.com

title: Idle Mafia Boss: Cosa Nostra

creator: ALPHATIER Studios
descriptionHtml:
Are you a true mafia godfather? Become a mafia city tycoon, build an empire, earn money, build a business, level up, make more money and get rich in this idle tycoon simulator game where you can make money by investing!
Expand your millionaire mafia and increase productivity with capos who will automate the workflow of your mafia business! Discover the manager strategy to invest in and earn as much cash as possible in this idle tycoon simulator - Live as an idle hero mafia tycoon! Be a mafia boss and conquer your mafia empire now! Are you ready to become an idle hero in this epic adventure to become a godfather?

Do you like idle clicker tycoon games and exciting mafia games? Want to be a godfather? Idle Mafia Boss is a simulation game that mixes mafia management and earning tons of money to become a rich godfather. Unlike other simulator and clicker tycoon games, the aim of this epic mafia adventure tap game is to build a mafia empire and level up to gain as many idle benefits as possible: with the income that you make from your mafia businesses, you will have to hire and pay capos, upgrade your businesses as well as optimise your workers. It differs from the other idle money tap games because you can become a mafia manager capitalist, build a millionaire mafia business, and earn money by optimizing the workflow with cash inc in this money game like in a clicker simulator. Make more in this idle simulator until you become a rich idle hero capitalist! Enjoy this epic mafia tycoon adventure with no adcap, try this tap game and become a godfather.

IDLE MAFIA BOSS SIMULATOR: MAKE MORE MONEY & BECOME THE GODFATHER
★ Automate your mafia business to make more idle cash income: No need to tap like in an online clicker simulator! Enjoy this addicting tycoon simulation game and level up!
★ Get idle cash inc and earn money & honor: Stay in business when you're offline!
★ Profit from investments and get rich! Taps to riches to become an epic idle hero millionaire among this offline simulator game with no adcap!
★ Hire a capo to increase your workers motivation for working! The mafia simulator among tap games.
★ Build up your idle billionaire empire simulation without the endless clicking you experience in other clicker money games and adventure games!
★ Manage and upgrade more than 20 mafia businesses like a boss: Become a mafia tycoon by managing this mafia simulator! Taps to riches for becoming an epic idle hero and upgrade your mafia!
★ Become a true godfather! Manage more than 4 cities: New York, Chicago, Hollywood and Las Vegas, making this different than all other idle tycoon games.
★ Increase your money and honor and taps to riches in this offline adventure simulator!
★ Make more and upgrade your mafia, level up and become the richest mafia godfather tycoon in this idle mafia simulation!

Unlike other simulator games, you get the chance to become a miner billionaire by automating the mafia workflow simulation of your magnate business . Get rich, purchase new businesses and buildings, invest cash and taps to riches to become the greatest godfather ever in this mafia simulator! Try the money games and manager games, unlike other idle tycoon games with adcap!
Earn by selling resources in this mafia tap game manager simulator. Build your empire and get rich! Taps to riches and become a capitalist millionaire tycoon! Enjoy this Idle Mafia Boss game!

title: Idle Mafia Boss: Cosa Nostra

creator: ALPHATIER Studios
descriptionHtml:
Have you ever wondered what it's like to be a leader of the Mafia, taking charge, running a business, and telling others what to do? You don't have to get involved in a life of crime to experience it for yourself in this single-player, offline game designed to simulate the real-life adventures of a true Don!

Start Your Journey to Becoming a Mafia Leader

Your life as a Godfather begins when tasked with the responsibility of completing missions. Each mission will help you gain experience, up your ranks, and earn the virtual cash needed to take your business to the next level.

Run Your Business Like a Pro

When completing missions, you'll work on running your business simultaneously, using money collected from those missions to pay for upgrades that will take the business to the next level. After all, you're the head poncho and want to ensure everyone beneath you respects the empire you've built. If not, you just might have to take them out!

Strengthen your empire using capos to handle the workflow, automating business tasks that will help you generate the wealth you desire as a Mafia leader. Continuously choose from some of the neatest upgrades available to build a solid business and maintain the highest level of respect possible.

Become the Mafia Leader You've Always Wanted to Be!

Go through various missions to improve your skills and experience level and use the idle tycoon simulator to begin bringing in more cash than you ever thought possible. Use the cash to make investments and expand your wealth even further. See what it's like to live the Mafioso lifestyle firsthand!

How to Get Started

Are you ready to play a game sure to have you on the edge of your seat as you work on leveling up and making a name for yourself? If so, Idle Mafia Boss is the perfect simulation game for you. Combining Mafia lifestyle and culture with the opportunity to earn cash and build in-game wealth, we're taking you on the adventure of a lifetime with a one-of-a-kind experience you don't want to miss!

Download the app today to get started. Create your account and begin building your empire by participating in thrilling missions to help you level up and earn cash to build your business from the ground up. Don't forget to hire capos to do some of the dirty work for you! Paying capos to complete tasks will save you time and effort while enabling you to build your empire even faster.

Discover What It's Like to Be a Real Godfather

With Idle Mafia Boss Stimulator, you can:

Experience what it's like to be a Mafia leader, responsible for handling cutthroat missions and generating wealth for your business
Hire capos to help automate repetitive tasks, get more work done with less effort, and earn more cash to use on your business
Earn in-game money and respect while building and expanding your business
Take on management responsibilities for dozens of Mafia-style businesses to strengthen your empire
Take over four of the best cities in the country, including New York, Hollywood, Las Vegas, and Chicago


So, what are you waiting for? Become a Mafia Boss today!
descriptionShort: Discover What It's Like to Take Charge as a True Mafia Godfather
